topic.title: EMS Medications Administered Section - conformance rules

section.p: Collection of information regarding the administration of medications

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11403 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.18"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10439)/@code="67849-0" EMS Medications Administered Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10987)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="Medications Administered" which SHOULD equal "Medications Administered Section" (CONF:10442)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10989)
Conforms to Medication Administered (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.72)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10439)/@code="67849-0" EMS Medications Administered Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10987)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="Medications Administered" which SHOULD equal "Medications Administered Section" (CONF:10442)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:10989)
Conforms to Medication Administered (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.72)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.18"/> <code code="67849-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS Medications Administered Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>Medications Administered Section</title> <text/> </section>
